nodes.bodyText: Do we know why these tests "work" without these changes?

The machine is 32C/64T, so my first guess is that there is some kind of race which is more easily reproducible on a high-core count machine.
I think the Powermock thing is a bug with powermock and might have something to do with the JVM? There is a very similar issue report here: powermock/powermock#370 where the error output is similar to what I saw
